Were you looking for the original (ceo) version?

The Airbus A319neo is a newer, refited engine option of the A319.

Trivia

  • There have been only 78 neos that have been ordered, the least of the neo variants.
  • Like the A320neo, there are options for two engine types, the CFM International LEAP-1A or the Pratt & Whitney PW1100G
